text: Viddalba (Vidda 'ècchja) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,718 people lived there. Its area is 50.41 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 22 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Viddalba
